summary: Converts Reachwind Eyrie into a player home.
descriptionHtml:
[heading][color=red][b]Reachwind Eyrie Player Home [/b][/color][/heading]

A request done for AutumnSky38, a user who wanted a small adjustment to Reachwind Eyrie to make it a player home. Well, I was more then happy to oblige! The place is small, but has everything you could need. Features include:

* Full crafting facilities
* Mannequin, weapon racks and plaques
* Cluttery goodness
* Lots of storage
* Double bed with Full-Rested
* Fully nav-meshed!
* A stone's throw away from the orc stronghold Duskin Yal

[color=darkorange]====[b]Video:[/b]====[/color]
Take a look at the video below to get a full glimpse of the place. Suited for Dwemer enthusiasts, explorers or anyone who just wants to live in a tower :) Hope you like it, Autumn!

[color=darkorange]====[b]Video:[/b]====[/color]

[youtube]Nc60aLlHZ5I[/youtube]

[color=darkorange]===[b]Installation:[/b]====[/color]

Just drop the file into your data folder. Or use the NMM. To uninstall, just remove the file. Make sure to get your belongings out first though!

[color=darkorange]=====[b]Permissions and Credits[/b]=====[/color]
This mod is not to be uploaded anywhere but the Skyrim Nexus. Please report to me if you see this anywhere else.
Thanks to Bethesda for creating a great game and letting us fiddle with it.

[color=red]Thanks for reading and check my page for more mods![/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7065334/?tb=mods&pUp=1 ] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2dryws3.png[/IMG][/url]
author: TaeRai
